sentences.sContent: We never think of this legume unless it's in our soup.
sentences.sContent_eng: We never think of this legume unless it's in our soup.
sentences.sCn: 我们从想不到这种豆类，除非它们放在汤里。

sentences.sContent: Pigeonpea is a hardy, drought-tolerant food legume high in protein and B vitamins, and offers the added benefit of fixing nitrogen and other nutrients in the soil.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pigeonpea is a hardy, drought-tolerant food legume high in protein and B vitamins, and offers the added benefit of fixing nitrogen and other nutrients in the soil.
sentences.sCn: 木豆是抵抗力强和耐旱性能好的食用豆类，蛋白质和维生素B的含量高，且有让土壤中的氮和其他养料更好混合的好处。

synos.tran: 豆类；[作物]豆科植物；豆荚
